title: Sysmon DNS Query for Suspicious TLD (.zip)
description: Detects DNS queries for the .zip TLD which can be used for phishing and malware distribution.
sigma:
title: Sysmon DNS Query for Suspicious TLD (.zip)
id: RULE-020
description: Detects DNS queries for the .zip TLD which can be used for phishing and malware distribution.
author: detpack-lab
status: experimental
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: sysmon
detection:
  selection:
    EventID: 22
    QueryName|endswith: ".zip"
  condition: selection
falsepositives:
  - Legitimate use of .zip domains (rare; review)
level: low
tags:
  - attack.t1566
  - attack.initial_access
